mapper.select: SELECT ca.custid AS cust_id, cu.name AS cust_name, it.name AS item2_name, it.price AS item2_price, ca.cnt, ca.date, p.totalprice AS totalprice FROM cart ca INNER JOIN cust cu ON ca.custid = cu.custid INNER JOIN item2 it ON ca.itemid = it.itemid INNER JOIN order_detail od ON it.itemid = od.itemid INNER JOIN purchase p ON od.orderid = p.orderid WHERE ca.cartid = #{cartid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart(custid, itemid, cnt, date) VALUES (#{cust_id},#{item2_id},#{cnt},NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET custid=#{cust_id}, itemid=#{item2_id}, cnt=#{cnt}, date=NOW() WHERE custid=#{cust_id}
